title: Penelope Cruz goes casual chic as the actress leaves JFK with flowers given to her by a fan
text:
She received a lifetime award from Bono in her home country of Spain on Friday night.

But Penelope Cruz was being celebrated in the United States too on Thursday, when the 45-year-old actress left JFK international airport with a bunch of flowers gifted to her by a fan inside the terminal.

The Vanilla Sky star went with a casual chic look for her flight, pairing flared jeans with a low cut black top.

Flower power! Penelope Cruz, 45, left JFK international airport with a gifted bunch of flowers on Thursday

The Vicky Cristina Barcelona star covered up in a black blazer, and added inches to her 5ft6in frame in a pair of chunky platform soled boots.

Cruz shielded her eyes with a pair of round framed sunglasses and wore her wavy brunette tresses loose and swept over her left shoulder.

A black bag was slung over her right shoulder and with her left hand she held the beautiful floral bouquet.

The look: The Vanilla Sky star went with a casual chic look for her flight, pairing flared jeans with a low cut black top

Well-heeled: The Vicky Cristina Barcelona star covered up in a black blazer, and added inches to her 5ft6in frame in a pair of chunky platform soled boots

Last Friday, Cruz was awarded with the Lifetime Achievement prize at the San Sebastian Film Festival.

The award was presented by U2 frontman Bono, with the Wasp Network actress cutting a glamorous figure in a stunning white one-shoulder dress, which featured ruched detailing across the bust.

Penelope's dress fanned out into a breathtaking a-line style, and boasted dramatic pink feathered detailing down the side and back of the garment.

Winner are grinners: Last Friday, Cruz was awarded with the Lifetime Achievement prize at the San Sebastian Film Festival

She gave the ensemble a further injection of style, as she cinched her slim waist with a black leather belt and wore a pair of dazzling drop earrings.

After handing Penelope the gong, Bono, 59, got down on one knee in front of the star and kissed her hand on stage for the audience to see.

Following his very public display of affection, Penelope returned the sweet gesture by mirroring his actions.

Her man: After previously dating Tom Cruise, the Spanish beauty has been married to Javier Bardem since 2010
